name: Bloodbound: The Siege
description:
Bloodbound: The Siege is a fan-made spinoff where you play as newly turned vampire navigating Gaius’s regime. Will you aid the Clanless in protecting humans from Gaius? Will you aid Gaius in building the world he’s always wanted? Or will you fall somewhere in the middle? The choice is yours.

This is a demo of a visual novel that will most likely be completed in late 2023 or early 2023. As such, it is not perfect, there may still be bugs, and these first two chapters may be tweaked or changed for the official release.

Please report any bugs to the project's tumblr page, or leave a comment here.
